name: align-content
definition: align-content property aligns the content vertically (along cross/block/column axis) within a container. The container adjusts its padding so as to align the content vertically. We are using a flex container

propertyValue.name: flex-start
propertyValue.description: lines packed to the start of the container.

propertyValue.name: flex-end
propertyValue.description: lines packed to the end of the container.

propertyValue.name: center
propertyValue.description: lines packed to the center of the container.

propertyValue.name: space-between
propertyValue.description: lines evenly distributed; the first line is at the start of the container while the last one is at the end.

propertyValue.name: space-around
propertyValue.description: lines evenly distributed with equal space between them.
